text: A tool that is falling into disuse, to remind killers that they too are mortal. It is placed around the neck and accompanies the wearer until the end of his life. In many places it has been replaced by a more complex electrical device that is applied to another part of the body; but this system, in turn, is being rapidly replaced by an apparatus called a sermone. The Devil's Dictionary, 1906
title: Soga
author: Ambrose Bierce
